sentences.en: " Explain, " repeated Mr. Bamberger, looking intently at his part.
sentences.cn: “ 你要解释清楚, " 班贝格先生紧张地看着他的台词又重复了一遍.

sentences.en: " I want to see you,'said Tom intently. " Get on the next train. "
sentences.cn: “ 我要见你, ”汤姆热切地说道, “ 搭下一班火车. ”

sentences.en: As we walked alongside each other, she listened intently as I told her about you, about us, about the wonderful times we shared.
sentences.cn: 我们肩并肩地走着,她专心地听着我讲述你,讲述我们,以及我们一起分享的那些美好时光。

sentences.en: Christine had been listening intently, an elbow planted on her desk.
sentences.cn: 克丽丝汀专心一意地听着, 一只臂肘抵在她的办公桌上.

sentences.en: Conference participants were clearly enthused by their presence, and the two women responded by listening intently.
sentences.cn: 她们的出席令与会者明显兴奋起来，作为回应这两位女士也专心倾听起来。

sentences.en: Doran was clutching the bottle with both hands and sucking intently.
sentences.cn: 多兰双手紧紧抓着瓶子尽情地喝着。

sentences.en: He listened intently to whatever was being said on the telephone.
He listened intently, then slammed down the phone.
sentences.cn: 他专心地听着，然后砰地挂上电话。

sentences.en: He sat very erect, listening intently.
sentences.cn: 他坐得笔直, 专心地听.

sentences.en: He was looking at her intently but she stared him out.
sentences.cn: 他专注地看着她,可她盯得他移开了目光.

sentences.en: He watched her face intently to catch every nuance of expression.
sentences.cn: 他认真地注视着她的脸，捕捉每一丝细微的表情变化。

sentences.en: His eyes blazed intently into mine.
I could see a man staring at me intently.
sentences.cn: 我能看到有个男人专注地盯着我看.

sentences.en: I strained my ears and listened intently.
O'Brien was standing at his side, looking down at him intently.
sentences.cn: 奥勃良站在旁边, 注意地低头看着他.

sentences.en: Pearl saw, and gazed intently, but never sought to make acquaintance.
sentences.cn: 珠儿在一旁瞅着, 注视着, 但从来没打算和他们结识.

words.tran_cn: 专心地；一心一意地；心无旁物地

trans.tran_cn: 专心地，专注地，热切地，热心地
